oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Concert for Manglerdesh at the Ryman Auditorium (red)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: fund raising; Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One color window card (red on white) announcing the Concert for Manglerdesh, a fundraiser for road manager Phil “Mangler” Kaufman. The event featured Emmylou Harris, Trisha Yearwood, Steve Earle, Nanci Griffith, Marty Stuart, John Prine, Sweethearts of Rodeo, Delevantes, Pat McLaughlin, Guy Clark, BR5-49, Jon Randall, Riders in the Sky, Bob Woodruff, Sam Bush, Rodney Crowell, and Barry and Holly Tashian with host Austin Church at the Ryman Auditorium on October 8. Poster features metal photoplates of the Ryman Auditorium and Phil Kaufman.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jeremy Maynard
